alert.note: Alert for Greenwood; Newberry; Saluda (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 10 at 5:03AM EDT until April 11 at 3:24PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... Saluda River At Chappells affecting Saluda, Greenwood and Newberry Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Carolina... Congaree River At Congaree National Park-Gadsden affecting Calhoun and Richland Counties. Congaree River At Carolina Eastman affecting Calhoun, Lexington and Richland Counties. Pee Dee River At Cheraw affecting Marlboro and Chesterfield Counties. North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saluda River At Chappells. * WHEN...From early this morning to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, Lowlands around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. Cattle grazing river bottomland should be moved to higher ground. At 16.0 feet, Extensive farmland and river bottomland around and downstream from Chappells become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM EDT Monday the stage was 14.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is near crest and is expected to fall below flood stage late this afternoon and continue falling to 6.3 feet Friday evening. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
